reviewText: It seems that a number of people in the documentary would not hold the same view of the gospel or the Christian Life as David Brainerd would( from what I have read of his book). Seems to lack a reformed view of the gospel appart from small sections of documentary.
We enjoyed it very much. Very informative. This man had a great heart for God.

Documentary of missionary David Brainerd presented within the historical, social and religious context of his life. Good coverage of his life and ministry as well as interesting information about the American Indians of the area and Brainerds contemporaries including Jonathan Edwards, George Whitefield, and John Wesley.
Wish it would of been more movie.
One of the best documenteries on David Brainerd to date.  A must watch.
